details.p: Issues will be managed using the sourceforge task list. Any large problems facing the project can be mentioned here, but typically, these become out of date rather quickly.

issues.item: Update workproducts as needed and mark tasks in sourceforge completed

traceability.impacted-by: Description of how this workproduct is impacted by the "impacted-by" workproduct.
traceability.impacts: Description of how this workprodcuct impacts the "impacts" workproduct.
